hero.title: Tech Assistance Made Simple
hero.subtitle: Empowering everyone to thrive in the digital age

about.title: Our Mission
about.description: We aim to make technology accessible to everyone. We believe in the importance of digital literacy and are committed to providing patient, personalized assistance to those who need it.

services.title: Our Services
services.service1: Tech Setup: Setting up devices like smartphones, computers, and smart home gadgets.
services.service2: Troubleshooting: Solving common tech issues and errors.
services.service3: Learning Sessions: One-on-one or group sessions to teach basic tech skills.
services.service4: Online Safety: Guidance on staying safe online, including managing passwords and recognizing scams.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.step1: Contact Us: Reach out via phone, email, or our online form.
howItWorks.step2: Schedule a Session: Choose a convenient time for your tech help session.
howItWorks.step3: Get Assistance: Receive personalized help from our friendly experts.
howItWorks.step4: Follow Up: We follow up to ensure your tech issues are resolved and you're satisfied.

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.quote1: I never thought I could use my smartphone so confidently until I got help from Tech Assistance for Everyone.
